Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1969...
Earned first career win on 4/18/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/13/1973, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1978, going 7-0, 2.52...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1979, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1984, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Struck out 15 batters against Atlanta on 9/22/1984...
Traded from St. Louis to Cincinnati on 7/7/1985 (Going to CIN: P B. Blyleven. Going to STL: CF C. Davis, P M. Moore)...
